name: NWListener.State
desc: States indicating whether a listener is able to accept incoming connections.

items.name: case setup
items.desc: The listener has been initialized but not started.

items.name: case waiting(NWError)
items.desc: The listener is waiting for a network to become available.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: The listener is running and able to receive incoming connections.

items.name: case failed(NWError)
items.desc: The listener has encountered a fatal error.

items.name: static func != (NWListener.State, NWListener.State) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are not equal.
